sharedapps.name: ELAND
sharedapps.description: Solexa/Illumina short read aligner (max 32 bps aligned)

sharedapps.name: bowtieIndex
sharedapps.description: Run bowtie-build to convert FASTA files into *ebwt indexed files

sharedapps.name: elandIndex
sharedapps.description: Convert FASTA files into squashed/indexed ELAND reference files

sharedapps.name: elandHeader
sharedapps.description: Convert incorrect header formats to the simple header format accepted by ELAND and other aligners matching this regex:

sharedapps.name: maqIndex
sharedapps.description: Run maq-build to convert FASTA files into *.bfa binary indexed files

sharedapps.name: eland2ace
sharedapps.description: Convert Eland output sorted.txt file into an .ace file

sharedapps.name: novoIndex
sharedapps.description: Run novoindex to convert FASTA files into binary indexed files

sharedapps.name: TOPHAT
sharedapps.description: A wrapper script to run TOPHAT (which uses Bowtie) to do fast short read alignment against a reference sequence
sharedapps.notes: Uses Tophat v 0.1.12 and Bowtie v 0.12.2

sharedapps.name: SAV
sharedapps.description: SNP Annotation and Verification
sharedapps.notes: Call SNPs in pileup format from .SAM or .BAM file generated for each chromosome of the target species (DEFAULT: human hg19) and compare with dbSNP (DEFAULT: dbsnp130)

sharedapps.name: image2eland
sharedapps.description: Process images into base calls with Bustard and align reads against reference sequence with Eland

sharedapps.name: MAQ
sharedapps.description: Align to reference and predict SNPs.

sharedapps.name: filterSNP
sharedapps.description: Filter SNPs by quality, coverage, etc.

sharedapps.name: sleep
sharedapps.description: Run test.pl to sleep and print to stdout file

sharedapps.name: createRefDirs
sharedapps.description: Create reference file sub-directories, one for each chromosome sequence file in the input directory. Each sub-directory contains a linked copy of the corresponding chromosome sequence file in the input directory.

sharedapps.name: FTP
sharedapps.description: Download FTP files or web pages from a URL
sharedapps.notes: Download all files found in links in a page or raw text file

sharedapps.name: chopfile
sharedapps.description: Print a user-defined number of lines from one file to another file

sharedapps.name: unzipFiles
sharedapps.description: Unzip or gunzip files, with an optional filter

sharedapps.name: replaceString
sharedapps.description: Convert .ace file into multiple ace files

sharedapps.name: splitace
sharedapps.description: Convert a single .ace file into multiple ace files, one for each contig.

sharedapps.name: jbrowseFeatures
sharedapps.description: Generate JBrowse features for all chromosomes in parallel

amis.description: Ubuntu 10.04 StarCluster exec node image with Hadoop installed

sharedparameters.description: Length of sleep in seconds between queue polls (default: 5)

sharedparameters.name: key
sharedparameters.description: Key for features in JBrowse

sharedparameters.name: label
sharedparameters.description: Label for experiment (e.g., bowtie)

sharedparameters.name: maxjobs
sharedparameters.description: Maximum number of jobs to be running or queued concurrently (default: 100)

sharedparameters.description: Location of JBrowse installation (default: JBROWSE key value in default.conf file.)

sharedparameters.name: filetype
sharedparameters.description: Type of input file (bam or gff)

sharedparameters.name: inputdir
sharedparameters.description: Directory with chromosome subdirs containing input files. JBrowse output files will be printed to subdirs
sharedparameters.paramFunction: if ( outdir1 != null && outdir1 !=  ) return outdir1; if ( outdir2 != null && outdir2 !=  ) return outdir2;

sharedparameters.name: filename
sharedparameters.description: Name of input file. If not defined, the application will process all files in the inputdir.
sharedparameters.paramFunction: if ( hits != null && hits !=  ) { return hits.match(/([^\/]+)$/)[1]; } for ( var i = 0; i < inputs.length; i++) { if ( inputs[i].value.match(/([^/]+.bam)$/) ) { return inputs[i].value.match(/([^/]+.bam)$/)[1]; }}

sharedparameters.name: build
sharedparameters.description: Reference species build (e.g., hg19, mm9, rn4)

sharedparameters.name: cpus
sharedparameters.description: Number of cpus per job

sharedparameters.name: splitfile
sharedparameters.description: File containing list of batch input sequence file locations

sharedparameters.name: snp-filter
sharedparameters.description: Filtered SNP predictions based on indelsoa, indelpe and cns.snp files

sharedparameters.name: species
sharedparameters.description: Species name (e.g., human, mouse)

sharedparameters.name: snp
sharedparameters.description: List of raw SNPs extracted from comparison of consensus and reference files

sharedparameters.name: reads
sharedparameters.description: Number of reads per batch input file (Default = 1 million)

sharedparameters.name: referencedir
sharedparameters.description: Directory containing MAQ format binary fasta (.bfa) files for all human chromosomes

sharedparameters.name: queue
sharedparameters.description: Submit to a particular queue or add other submission options

sharedparameters.name: maxjobs
sharedparameters.description: Maximum number of concurrently queued or running jobs on the cluster queue for this run (Default: 30)

sharedparameters.name: outputdir
sharedparameters.description: Output alignment and SNP files will be printed to this directory

sharedparameters.name: matefile
sharedparameters.description: Second paired-end sequence file

sharedparameters.name: mapfile
sharedparameters.description: Binary mapping file containing alignment of all reads against reference

sharedparameters.name: label
sharedparameters.description: A one-word label describing the experiment or data

sharedparameters.name: inputfile
sharedparameters.description: Single read or first paired-end sequence file

sharedparameters.name: indelsoa
sharedparameters.description: Predicted homozygous indels

sharedparameters.name: hzsnps-filter
sharedparameters.description: Filtered predicted homozygous indels

sharedparameters.name: consensus
sharedparameters.description: Consensus sequence and qualities in FASTQ format

sharedparameters.name: dupfile
sharedparameters.description: Same as out.map file but with duplicate reads aligned against the reference with identical outer coordinates removed

sharedparameters.name: convert
sharedparameters.description: Convert from Solexa FASTQ to Sanger FASTQ

sharedparameters.name: clean
sharedparameters.description: Clean run (remove old splitfile)

sharedparameters.name: PE-indels
sharedparameters.description: Indel calls, only produced with paired-end reads

sharedparameters.name: species
sharedparameters.description: Name of the reference species (e.g., human, mouse)

sharedparameters.name: outputdir
sharedparameters.description: Directory with one subdirectory per reference chromosome, each containing an out.sav output file

sharedparameters.name: dbsnp
sharedparameters.description: dbSNP version for given species

sharedparameters.name: reference
sharedparameters.description: Location of indexed reference file  (NB: Use file stub, e.g., /some/path/hg19)

sharedparameters.name: queue
sharedparameters.description: Cluster queue options

sharedparameters.name: params
sharedparameters.description: Additional parameters to be passed to tophat (e.g., --solexa1.3-quals

sharedparameters.name: outputfile
sharedparameters.description: SAM file containing

sharedparameters.name: outputdir
sharedparameters.description: Create this directory and write output files to it

sharedparameters.name: matefiles
sharedparameters.description: Comma-separated *sequence.txt mate file names (e.g., s_1_2_sequence.txt,s_2_2_sequence.txt) with locations as paths relative to the output directory

sharedparameters.name: label
sharedparameters.description: Name to used to submit jobs to cluster (e.g., tophat-sample1)

sharedparameters.name: keep
sharedparameters.description: Keep intermediate files

sharedparameters.name: jobs
sharedparameters.description: Max. number of concurrent cluster jobs (DEFAULT = 30)

sharedparameters.name: junctions
sharedparameters.description: A UCSC BED track of junctions reported by TopHat. Each junction consists of two connected BED blocks, where each block is as long as the maximal overhang of any read spanning the junction. The score is the number of alignments spanning the junction.

sharedparameters.name: hits
sharedparameters.description: A list of read alignments in SAM format. SAM is a compact short read alignment format that is increasingly being adopted.

sharedparameters.name: inputfiles
sharedparameters.description: Comma-separated *sequence.txt file names (e.g., s_1_1_sequence.txt,s_2_1_sequence.txt)

sharedparameters.name: distance
sharedparameters.description: The  mean inner distance between first read and its mate pair (corresponds to -r/--mate-inner-dist argument to Tophat)

sharedparameters.name: coverage
sharedparameters.description: A UCSC BedGraph wigglegram track, showing the depth of coverage at each position, including the spliced read alignments.

sharedparameters.name: cpus
sharedparameters.description: Max. number of cpus per job (1 to 4) (DEFAULT = 4)

sharedparameters.name: type
sharedparameters.description: Name of unzip application (unzip|gunzip) (DEFAULT: gunzip)

sharedparameters.name: regex
sharedparameters.description: Unzip only files matching this regular expression

sharedparameters.description: Unzip files to this directory

sharedparameters.description: Unzip only files containing this text fragment
